overview: PLEASE FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS CAREFULLY, DO NOT EXCEED RECOMMENDED DOSAGE. 1. Put your 3D spectacles firmly on your nose. 2. Position yourself comfortably in front of the T.V. screen + prepare for an unforgetable journey into ecstasy.  3. Listen to this virtual audio system (3D sound) with stereophonic equipments. To get more effects, we recommend the use of headphones. 4. Turn off the light, kick back, relax+enjoy.
title: Virtual Drug Ecstasy
